sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { Navbar, Nav, Container, NavDropdown, } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { LinkContainer } from 'react-router-bootstrap'; import {useDispatch,useSelector} from "react-redux" import { logout } from '../actions/userActions'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const Header = () => { const dispatch=useDispatch() const userLogin = useSelector((state) => state.userLogin); const { userInfo } = userLogin; const logoutHandler=()=>{ console.log("logout") dispatch(logout()) } return (
BESTBUY
HOME CART {userInfo ? ( Profile Logout ) : ( SIGN IN )} {userInfo && userInfo.isAdmin && ( Uers Products Orders )}
); } export default Header
